result.arabic_text: فَلَا تَهِنُواْ وَتَدۡعُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱلسَّلۡمِ وَأَنتُمُ ٱلۡأَعۡلَوۡنَ وَٱللَّهُ مَعَكُمۡ وَلَن يَتِرَكُمۡ أَعۡمَٰلَكُمۡ
result.translation: Bemeramana! Ntimugacike inkokora ngo mutinye guhangana n’ababangikanyamana ku rugamba, mubararikira kwishikana kandi ari mwebwe benintsinzi mushoboye no kubanesha; burya Imana Allah, Iri kumwe na mwe mu kubatera intege, kandi ntizogabanya indishi ku vyo mwakoze.
